item.title: TestScape - Pickup Command Does not Work?
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

::pickup [item id] [ammount]

remember if the item is 3 digits, use 0567 if the item is 2 digits use 0045 and so on.

No capitals.

item.title: TestScape - Pickup Command Does not Work?
item.dc:creator: @hydromcmac2 hydromcmac2
item.description:
@hydromcmac2 wrote:

My pickup command is:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } } else if (command.startsWith("nick")) { try { playerName = command.substring(5); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::nick [NEWNAME]"); } }
â€¦and The Pickup Command will not let Admins spawn items. What the hell is wrong? lol.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 05:01:20 PM[/size][hr]Come on?!
